modmenu.descriptionTranslation.cloud_rev: Adds unique death mechanics, turning mortality into a resource.
item.cloud_revive.birth_beacon.tooltip1: Consumes a §9Chaos Orb§r to summon all your past-life §7Wandering Spirits§r in this dimension.
item.cloud_revive.start_cage.tooltip2: Attracts §5Qingdu§r fragments from the void and reveals them.
item.cloud_revive.start_cage.tooltip3: §eWarning: Ensure §5Qingdu§e fragments have space to manifest! §4Use outdoors§e!
item.cloud_revive.start_cage.tooltip4: §7§oFor unknown reasons, §5Qingdu§7§o fragments always manifest in the east...
item.cloud_revive.cage.tooltip2: Above Y=128: Capture §9『Celestial Yang Chi』§r (high durability cost).
item.cloud_revive.cage.tooltip3: Below Y=0: Capture §9『Abyssal Yin Chi』§r (high durability cost).
item.cloud_revive.cage.tooltip4: Hold §eSneak§r: Harm yourself to extract §9『Living Harmony Chi』§r.
item.cloud_revive.cage.tooltip5: §7§oOnly works at full health without weakness.
item.cloud_revive.chaos_cage.tooltip2: Target §iWandering Spirits§r to retrieve items and extract §9『Spectral Soul Chi』§r.
item.cloud_revive.soul_pearl.tooltip2: Destroy the gem to transfer its soul imprint to an item in §9off-hand§r (if compatible).
item.cloud_revive.pearl.tooltip4: §9Roaming Chi Cage§7; §9Chaos Soul Cage§7; 『Chaos Core Chi』; §9Cracked Chi Core§7
item.cloud_revive.chaos_pearl.tooltip4: §9Chaos Orb§r§7; §eSoulshift§r§7; Repair; §9Soul Chi Apple§r§7; Soul Bind; ...
item.cloud_revive.chaos_pearl.tooltip5: §4§lCan fuel §9Afterlife Beacon§r§4§l (interact with off-hand to charge).
item.cloud_revive.soul_fruit.tooltip1: §7§oFrom despair comes hope; Through death, life blooms.
tip.pearl.1:
First Goal: Prioritize crafting §9Chaos Soul Cage§r,
or you'll lose items upon death!
Start by making §9Primordial Cage§r.
tip.pearl.2:
§7Wandering Spirit§r: Spawns after death, carries all items.
Moves to nearest air block. Use §9Chaos Soul Cage§r to retrieve.
tip.pearl.3:
§7Wandering Spirit§r: Delivers §9Chaos Soul Cage§r (or components) to aid your next life.
Follows and occasionally communicates.
tip.pearl.4:
§7Wandering Spirit§r: A cluster of Chi. Cannot carry XP.
Invulnerable and non-interactive, but can expend itself to act.
tip.pearl.5:
§9Primordial Cage§r: Attracts §5§lQingdu§r fragments in off-hand,
revealing them nearby.
tip.pearl.6:
§5§lQingdu§r: The Chi realm. Shattered years ago,
scattering fragments worldwide.
tip.pearl.7:
§5§lQingdu Fragments§r: Contain resources like 『Primordial Chi』,
used to craft §9Roaming Chi Cage§r.
tip.pearl.8:
§9Roaming Chi Cage§r: Captures 『Celestial Yang Chi』, 『Abyssal Yin Chi』,
and 『Living Harmony Chi』.
tip.pearl.9:
§9Chaos Soul Cage§r: All functions of §9Roaming Chi Cage§r,
plus stores §iWandering Spirits§r to extract Soul Chi.
tip.pearl.10:
『Chaos Core Chi』: Born from three Chi and treasure energy.
Crafts §9Chaos Orb§r and §9Chaos Soul Cage§r.
tip.pearl.11: §9Cracked Chi Core§r: Fragile. Breaking yields 『Primordial Chi』.
tip.pearl.12:
§9Withered Chi Bush§r grows on §9Stagnant Chi Block§r.
Drops §9Chi Apples§r.
tip.pearl.13:
『Primordial Chi』: Found in §5§lQingdu Fragments§r.
Crafts §9Roaming Chi Cage§r.
tip.pearl.14: §9Chi Apple§r: Non-nourishing. Grants levitation and rare buffs.
tip.pearl.15:
§9Primordial Pearl§r: Grants basic knowledge until §9Chaos Soul Cage§r is made.
Also crafts §9Chaos Orb§r and §9Primordial Cage§r.
tip.pearl.16:
Progression: After §9Chaos Soul Cage§r,
use §9Primordial Pearl§r to make §9Chaos Orb§r for advanced knowledge.
tip.pearl.17:
Commands: §2/killghost§r clears spirits in 20000 blocks §4(use carefully)§r.
§2/givepearl§r grants a §9Primordial Pearl§r.
tip.chaos_pearl.1:
Item Duplication: Use 『Chaos Core Chi』 to duplicate rare items
(e.g., Nether Stars, Netherite Ingots, Enchanted Golden Apples).
tip.chaos_pearl.2:
§5§lQingdu§r: Once souls' destination. After the disaster,
souls wander with fragmented memories.
tip.chaos_pearl.3: 『Spectral Soul Chi』: Extracted from souls. Crafts §9Soulbrand Gem§r and §9Soul Chi Apple§r.
tip.chaos_pearl.4: §9Afterlife Beacon§r: Summons all past-life spirits. Requires §9Chaos Orb§r to charge.
tip.chaos_pearl.5: §9Afterlife Beacon§r: Only affects the activator's current dimension.
tip.chaos_pearl.6:
§9Soulbrand Gem§r: Contains soul data from §iWandering Spirits§r.
Essential for §9Afterlife Beacon§r.
tip.chaos_pearl.7: §9Soulbrand Gem§r: Bound to your soul essence, manifests as "§dSoul Bind§r" enchantment.
tip.chaos_pearl.8: §9Chaos Orb§r: Holds advanced knowledge. Powers §9Afterlife Beacon§r.
tip.chaos_pearl.9: §eSoulshift§r: Become invulnerable like a ghost temporarily.
tip.chaos_pearl.10:
Repair: Use 『Primordial Chi』 for §9Roaming Chi Cage§r,
『Chaos Core Chi』 for §9Chaos Soul Cage§r.
tip.chaos_pearl.11: §9Soul Chi Apple§r: Grants §eSoulshift§r but reduces interaction.
tip.chaos_pearl.12:
§dSoul Bind§r: Universal enchantment. Items won't drop on death,
transferring to your §breincarnation§r.
tip.chaos_pearl.13:
§dSoul Bind§r: Treasure enchantment. Cannot be enchanted normally.
Rumored to dwell within §9Soulbrand Gems§r.
